episodes.title: A ‘FREE LOVE’ CULT & BIOTERRORISM? | The Viral Florida Sheriff | Izabella Loving’s Shocking Death
episodes.description:
On this week’s “Criminally Obsessed,” we’re talking cults, bad parents, trial watchers … and a viral law enforcement video.

KEY EPISODE MOMENTS
00:58 – Why did a video of Volusia County, Florida Sheriff Mike Chitwood greeting a fraud suspect at the airport go viral?
05:11 – Inside Nevada five-year-old Izabella Loving’s tragic death and the abuse she suffered that delayed her getting the help she needed
11:48 – Senior investigative reporter Anne Emerson takes you inside the Lori Vallow Daybell courtroom to tell you what she witnessed as the ‘Doomsday Mom’ was found guilty of conspiring to murder her estranged husband, Charles Vallow 
15:36 -- Would you travel to sit in a courtroom and watch a murder trial?
18:17 – Free love and forced labor? Learn how the Rajneeshees committed the largest bioterrorist attack in United States history – and we’ll tell you where you can find exclusive archival reporting on the cult

With 1,400 reporters spread across the country, "Criminally Obsessed" is the place to stay up to date with all that’s happening in the true crime world. Our reporters and producers work their sources to unearth the most fascinating details behind these shocking tales, giving you an inside look at what’s current and trending in true crime.


_______________
ABOUT
Criminally Obsessed is first on the scene, uniting fellow armchair detectives in their quest to crack the case.

episodes.title: THE CULT THAT POISONED AN ENTIRE TOWN | A 10-Part 'Wild Wild Country' Investigation from 1983-1984
episodes.description:
Made famous by the Netflix series "Wild Wild Country," the Rajneeshees were a religious organization (or a cult, depending on who you ask) that moved to Oregon and attempted to take over the city of Antelope. Their ambition to control the region went so far as to poison 751 people in The Dalles, Oregon, in order to win a county election. 

This archival footage is a 10-part series from KATU-TV, investigating the conflict between the community and the cutthroat organization bent on growth at all cost. 

0:00 -- Rajneesh, sex, and violence
5:37 -- Meet the new neighbors
10:51 -- Rajneesh takes over Antelope
14:37 -- A farm turns into an illegal city
19:06 -- “Work is called worship"
24:45 -- 100,000 people living underground?
29:34 -- Why do smart people give up everything for Rajneesh?
35:18 -- “A military base, rather than a commune”
41:12 -- The myth of Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh
45:10 -- A campaign of harassment 

_______________
